header.p: I am a Front-end developer who turns pixels into experiences.

about-me.p: I am Carlos Eduardo, and I started programming at the age of 14. I enjoy keeping up with the latest trends and technologies to enhance the projects I work on. I am always learning and seeking new challenges, which keeps my enthusiasm for programming alive.

skills.p: JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Responsive Design, Intuitive Design.

more-about-me.p-end: or follow my ideas and experiences through my posts on

linkioo.title: Linkioo
linkioo.subtitle: A simple, fast, and efficient link shortener.
linkioo.description: Linkioo is a simple, fast, and efficient link shortener. With it, you can transform long URLs into short, easy-to-share links. Technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, next-intl (Languages: EN, PT), MongoDB Atlas, TailwindCSS, and Vercel.

devkiit.title: DevKiit
devkiit.subtitle: A set of web tools.
devkiit.description: DevKiit is a set of tools for developers and general users, offering essential functionalities to optimize workflow. Technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, next-intl, and Prettier.

zen-homepage.title: ZEN HOMEPAGE
zen-homepage.subtitle: Minimalist homepage for browsers.
zen-homepage.description: ZEN HOMEPAGE is a minimalist homepage for browsers, designed to offer practical tools such as conversions, calculator, random password generator, custom search, and much more.
